activities: Hewitt Associates LLC (d/b/a Aon Hewitt) processes Client Data for purposes related to human resources business process outsourcing (HR BPO).  Upon written agreement with a Controller-client of Hewitt Associate LLC's HR BPO service, Hewitt Associates LLC will rely upon this Safe Harbor certification for the legitimate transfer and import of Client Data.  Absent such an agreement, Hewitt Associates LLC shall execute EU model clauses (aka EU standard contractual clauses) as a processor for the import of Client Data. Client Data includes but is not limited to identification, employment, employment benefits, personnel administration, and management data.
corpofftitle1: Deputy Global Chief Compliance Officer, Aon
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Client Data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
